resources.string: Improve ability to gather space debris. Increases rate of resource retrieval.
Other ships were also sent on this mission. Unfortunately our homing beacon was destoyed on launch. Repair beacon and try to signal a ship.
Increase the freqeuncy of the beacon\'s signal to attract stronger allies.

string-array.name: gun_descriptions
string-array.item: The ship\'s main blaster was damaged on launch. It wouldn\'t take much to fix it up.
There\'s room for another gun here… Though we\'d have to reroute some power from the main blaster.
An upgrade to the phase annihilator would bring both lazers up to full power.
The guns could be tilted outwards, but some major structural changes would need to be made.
These aliens have been dropping a stockpile of missiles, we just need a way to launch them.
